description: Smoove is a platform for creating and managing your email list and sending emails to your subscribers.

actions.name: addOrUpdateSubscriber
actions.description: Create or update subscriber data, and subscribe/unsubscribe from lists

actions.name: createAList
actions.description: Create a new mailing list with custom settings and descriptions

actions.name: findSubscriber
actions.description: Search for subscribers by unique identifiers (ID, email, phone, external ID) or name

actions.name: unsubscribe
actions.description: Unsubscribe a contact from all lists and move them to the "Unsubscribed" list

triggers.name: newFormCreated
triggers.description: Fires when a new form/landing page is created in your Smoove account

triggers.name: newLeadSubmitted
triggers.description: Fires when a lead submits via form, popup, or mobile campaign

triggers.name: newListCreated
triggers.description: Fires when a new mailing list is created in your Smoove account

triggers.name: newSubscriber
triggers.description: Fires when a new subscriber is added to your Smoove account
